abstract: Dow Jones & Company is selling a 90 percent stake in its stock-market index unit to the CME Group for $607.5 million.
snippet: Dow Jones & Company is selling a 90 percent stake in its stock-market index unit to the CME Group for $607.5 million.
lead_paragraph: Dow Jones & Company is selling a 90 percent stake in its stock-market index unit to the CME Group for $607.5 million, The Associated Press reports.

headline.main: CME to Buy Control of Dow Jones Index Unit
